name: MODLANDS (itch)
description:
WELCOME TO MODLANDS!!!

Modlands is a highly-moddable colony sim with Twitch integration!

  • Build worlds for your Twitch chat to live in as colonists!
  • Co-operate with the chat to build a base and defend it!
  • Your audience members can cooperate, role-play, or fight to the death in your world!

FOLLOW me here on itch.io to hear whenever I post new builds! :D

BIG UPDATE COMING END OF AUGUST!

At the end of August, Modlands will be getting a big update! This update will add:

  • Blockchain-based items that people can buy, sell and trade! Everyone who has bought the game, or backed it on Patreon before then, will get exclusive items as a reward.
  • The game will go free-to-play; instead of a separate demo build, there will be one build that everyone can download and play freely.
  • Gameplay updates - RTS-style controls to directly control colonists, and a Quest System to better introduce all the systems of the game
  • Support for Mixer and YouTube chat - supporting the other major streaming platforms, in addition to Twitch :)
LINKS
  • Watch streams of the game & its development every weekday, by following the Twitch Channel and Mixer Channel! This is a great place to try out the game and give me feedback on the chat-player experience, or to give me any kind of feedback on the game and get a live response!
  • Catch VIDEO DEVLOGS and other fun on the YouTube Channel!
  • Talk to me and chat with Modlands fans on the Discord Community
  • Get daily info on updates and when livestreams are happening on Twitter
  • Support ongoing development of Modlands and get special benefits, like your own character in the game, by joining the Patreon!
